thread.title: After a 2-Year Funk, McDonald’s Posts a Sales Gain, and Investors Applaud

title: After a 2-Year Funk, McDonald’s Posts a Sales Gain, and Investors Applaud
text:
Published By: NYTimes Business - Today 
Sales at stores open a year rose 4 percent in the third quarter, and even its troubled stores in the United States showed growth....
